it.polimi.se2019.view.client

Class RemoteView

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.view.client.RemoteView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MessageReceiverInterface, ViewInterface
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CLIView, GUIView

    public abstract class RemoteView
extends java.lang.Object
implements ViewInterface, MessageReceiverInterface
    Remote views must extend this class.
    Author:
    Marchingegno, Desno365, MArcerAndrea
